summary:
I fixed the mounted combat for that old mod without it you cant hit enemies while on horse (mainly for me)
Just install the main mod and use my update instead of his
It has to be very close to the bottom at the load order I found out.

>http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24600/?
descriptionHtml:
